con:testCase.name: BadCase-RatorService
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests negative business cases from Rator / PSST evolution services based on documentation in svn: ...src\trunk\SRs\Interfaces\RATOR-PSST\ST_TD_DRC_U-036_PSST_Interface_Specification-V3.2.1.pdf
Please note. No piranha checks for msisdns are allowed on rator interface. Please see description in drc-639
